name: CreateEnvironmentFileSystemLogView
description:
Create a file system log view for an environment.

This tool is used to create a file system log view for a specific project environment. It should be called when there is a need to set up or modify logging configurations in the environment's file system.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID to access the specific environment. Use /api/projects/ to find it.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: file_system_log_view_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details for the log view. Includes fields like `id`, `path`, `depth`, `type`, `ref`, `href`, `meta`, `shortcut`, `created_at`, and `last_viewed_at`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
